metadata.title: CVE-2022-27943 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description:
libiberty/rust-demangle.c in GNU GCC 11.2 allows stack consumption in demangle_const, as demonstrated by nm-new.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-27943` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

binutils - 2.39-1
binutils-aarch64-linux-gnu - 2.39-1
binutils-alpha-linux-gnu - 2.39-1
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabi - 2.39-1
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabihf - 2.39-1
binutils-common - 2.39-1
binutils-for-build - 2.39-1
binutils-for-host - 2.39-1
binutils-hppa-linux-gnu - 2.39-1
binutils-hppa64-linux-gnu - 2.39-1
binutils-i686-gnu - 2.39-1
binutils-i686-kfreebsd-gnu - 2.39-1
binutils-i686-linux-gnu - 2.39-1
binutils-ia64-linux-gnu - 2.39-1
binutils-m68k-linux-gnu - 2.39-1
binutils-multiarch - 2.39-1
binutils-powerpc-linux-gnu - 2.39-1
binutils-powerpc64-linux-gnu - 2.39-1
binutils-powerpc64le-linux-gnu - 2.39-1
binutils-riscv64-linux-gnu - 2.39-1
binutils-s390x-linux-gnu - 2.39-1
binutils-sh4-linux-gnu - 2.39-1
binutils-source - 2.39-1
binutils-sparc64-linux-gnu - 2.39-1
binutils-x86-64-kfreebsd-gnu - 2.39-1
binutils-x86-64-linux-gnu - 2.39-1
binutils-x86-64-linux-gnux32 - 2.39-1
libbinutils - 2.39-1
libctf-nobfd0 - 2.39-1
libctf0 - 2.39-1
libgprofng0 - 2.39-1
No subscription required

notes.note: sbeattie> gcc-3.3 only provides libstdc++5 eslerm> rust-demangle.c not present until gcc-7 litios> affected code introduced in 84096498 affected code introduced in binutils in d750c713 eslerm> binutils upstream patch (f10f861) has regression fixed in 96c33f7

criterions.comment: binutils package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.39-1').
gcc-11 package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
gcc-3.3 package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
gcc-9-cross package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
gcc-9-cross-ports package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
gcc-arm-none-eabi package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
gcc-avr package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
gcc-defaults package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
gcc-h8300-hms package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
gcc-m68hc1x package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
gcc-mingw-w64 package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
gcc-msp430 package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
gcc-opt package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
gcc-snapshot package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
